title: Formula One racing legend Lewis Hamilton subject of upcoming Apple TV+ documentary
content:
British Formula One racing legend Sir Lewis Hamilton has landed a documentary with Apple TV+. Directed by Matt Kay, the unnamed project will show behind-the-scenes footage of the world champion and his team. Additionally, it’ll feature clips on and off the track, his life story, and even some guest interviews.

more…

The post Formula One racing legend Lewis Hamilton subject of upcoming Apple TV+ documentary appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: British Formula One racing legend Sir Lewis Hamilton has landed a documentary with Apple TV+ showcasing his life and career.
